com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.basicUtils

类 HandlerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.basicUtils.HandlerUtils

  • public class HandlerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    An easy way to send Handler

    dismissViewHandler

    visiablViewHandler

    invisiablViewHandler

    sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler, int)

    sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler, int, android.os.Bundle)

    sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler, int, Object)

    sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler, int, String, int)

    sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler, int, String, String)

    sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler, int, long)

    sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler, int, Object, long)

    sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler, int, String, String, long)

    sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler, int, String, int, long)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static android.os.Handler dismissViewHandler
      Set visibility of the view which in message's obj visibility to GONE
      static android.os.Handler invisiablViewHandler
      Set visibility of the view which in message's obj visibility to INVISIBLE
      static android.os.Handler visiablViewHandler
      Set visibility of the view which in message's obj visibility to VISIBLE

      HandlerUtils() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler)
      Send an empty message which default what value is 0
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler, int what)
      Send an empty message containing only the what value.
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler, int what, android.os.Bundle bundle)
      Pushes a message containing bundle onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.Object obj)
      Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.String key, int value)
      Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
      static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
      static void sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler handler, int what, long delayTime)
      Sends a Message containing only the what value, to be delivered after the specified amount of time elapses.
      static void sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.Object obj, long delayTime)
      Enqueue a message containing what value and object into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis).
      static void sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.String key, int value, long delayTime)
      Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis).
      static void sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler handler, int what, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, long delayTime)
      Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis).

        Set visibility of the view which in message's obj visibility to VISIBLE

      • sendMessageHandler

        public static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler,
                      int what,
                      java.lang.Object obj)
        Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time. The message contains what value and object.
        参数:
        handler -
        what -
        obj -

      • sendMessageHandler

        public static void sendMessageHandler(android.os.Handler handler,
                      int what,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time. The message contains what value and a bundle with key and a String value.
        参数:
        handler -
        what -
        key -
        value -

        public static void sendMessageHandlerDelay(android.os.Handler handler,
                           int what,
                           java.lang.String key,
                           java.lang.String value,
                           long delayTime)
        Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis). The message contains what value and a bundle with key and a String value.
        参数:
        handler -
        what -
        key -
        value -
        delayTime -
